languages.text: "Откровение Омниссии было зашифровано с великим тщанием, что указывает на его великую значимость. Мне не дано постичь его в полной мере, но одного прикосновения хватило, чтобы понять грандиозность сокрытой в нем тайны. Точнее, Тайного замысла — так звал его технобрат Авель. Его разум прозрел в окружающем мире следы некоего масштабного умолчания, которое он желал постичь".

"The Omnissiah's revelation was encrypted with great meticulousness, which indicates its great importance. Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. His mind had discerned in the world around him traces of some grand silence that he wished to comprehend."
languages.original_text: "Откровение Омниссии было зашифровано с великим тщанием, что указывает на его великую значимость. Мне не дано постичь его в полной мере, но одного прикосновения хватило, чтобы понять грандиозность сокрытой в нем тайны. Точнее, Тайного замысла — так звал его технобрат Авель. Его разум прозрел в окружающем мире следы некоего масштабного умолчания, которое он желал постичь".

traits.locale_text: "The Omnissiah's revelation was encrypted with great meticulousness, which speaks to its great importance. Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. Certain evidence his mind had discerned in the world was pointing to a major withholding of information, the nature of which he wished to comprehend."

"The Omnissiah's revelation was encrypted with great meticulousness, which speaks to its great importance. Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. Certain evidence his mind had discerned in the world was pointing to a major withholding of information, the nature of which he wished to comprehend."

"The Omnissiah's revelation was encrypted with great meticulousness, which indicates its great importance. Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. His mind had discerned in the world around him traces of some large-scale silence that he wished to comprehend."

"The Omnissiah's revelation was encrypted with great meticulousness, which indicates its great importance. Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. His mind had discerned in the world around him traces of some large-scale silence that he wished to comprehend."

Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. His mind had discerned in the world around him traces of some grand silence that he wished to comprehend."

"The Omnissiah's revelation was encrypted with great meticulousness, which indicates its great importance. Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. His mind had discerned in the world around him traces of some grand silence that he wished to comprehend."

languages.text: "Die Offenbarung des Omnissiah wurde mit größter Sorgfalt verschlüsselt, was auf ihre gewaltige Bedeutung hinweist. Sie vollständig zu begreifen, übersteigt meine Fähigkeiten. Doch eine einzige Berührung reichte aus, um mir zu verdeutlichen, wie gewaltig das darin verborgene Geheimnis ist. Oder besser gesagt der Geheimplan, wie Tech-Bruder Abel es nannte. Sein Verstand hatte in der Welt um ihn herum Spuren eines großen Schweigens wahrgenommen, die er begreifen wollte."
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah's revelation was encrypted with great meticulousness, which indicates its great importance. Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. His mind had discerned in the world around him traces of some grand silence that he wished to comprehend."

traits.locale_text: "Die Offenbarung des Omnissiah wurde mit größter Sorgfalt verschlüsselt, was auf ihre gewaltige Bedeutung hinweist. Sie vollständig zu begreifen, übersteigt meine Fähigkeiten. Doch eine einzige Berührung reichte aus, um mir zu verdeutlichen, wie gewaltig das darin verborgene Geheimnis ist. Oder besser gesagt der Geheimplan, wie Tech-Bruder Abel es nannte. Sein Verstand hatte in der Welt um ihn herum Spuren eines großen Schweigens wahrgenommen, die er begreifen wollte."

languages.text: « Les révélations de l'Omnimessie étaient méticuleusement chiffrées, ce qui en indique l'extrême importance. Je suis incapable de les comprendre en totalité, mais un seul toucher m'a suffi pour réaliser l'importance du secret qu'elles renferment... ou, plus exactement, le Concept secret, comme l'appelait le technofrère Abel. Son esprit avait discerné, dans le monde qui l'entourait, les traces d'un grand silence qu'il tenait à comprendre. »
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah's revelation was encrypted with great meticulousness, which indicates its great importance. Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. His mind had discerned in the world around him traces of some grand silence that he wished to comprehend."

traits.locale_text: « Les révélations de l'Omnimessie étaient méticuleusement chiffrées, ce qui en indique l'extrême importance. Je suis incapable de les comprendre en totalité, mais un seul toucher m'a suffi pour réaliser l'importance du secret qu'elles renferment... ou, plus exactement, le Concept secret, comme l'appelait le technofrère Abel. Son esprit avait discerné, dans le monde qui l'entourait, les traces d'un silence à grande échelle qu'il tenait à comprendre. »

languages.text: “欧姆尼塞亚的重要启示经过了精心加密。虽然我无法完全理解，但仅仅触碰一下，就足以让我意识到隐藏其中的巨大秘密。或者更确切地说，应该是‘秘密构想’，技术兄弟亚伯就是这么称呼它的。他的头脑透过周围的世界，发现了某种伟大的静默迹象，而他想要理解这一切。”
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah's revelation was encrypted with great meticulousness, which indicates its great importance. Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. His mind had discerned in the world around him traces of some grand silence that he wished to comprehend."

traits.locale_text: “欧姆尼塞亚的重要启示经过了精心加密。虽然我无法完全理解，但仅仅触碰一下，就足以让我意识到隐藏其中的巨大秘密。或者更确切地说，应该是‘秘密构想’，技术兄弟亚伯就是这么称呼它的。他的头脑透过周围的世界，发现了某种大规模的静默迹象，而他想要理解这一切。”

languages.text: 「万機神の啓示は非常に緻密に暗号化されており、それがその重要性を示している。それを完全に理解することは私にはできないが、一度触れただけで、そこに隠された秘密の重大さには気付いた。ああ、もっと正確に言えば、技術同志アベル曰く『秘密の設計』なるものがあることに。彼の精神は、彼が理解したいと願った、大いなる静寂の痕跡を見定めていたのだ」
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah's revelation was encrypted with great meticulousness, which indicates its great importance. Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. His mind had discerned in the world around him traces of some grand silence that he wished to comprehend."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神の啓示は非常に緻密に暗号化されており、それがその重要性を示している。それを完全に理解することは私にはできないが、一度触れただけで、そこに隠された秘密の重大さには気付いた。ああ、もっと正確に言えば、テックブラザー・アベル曰く『秘密の設計』なるものがあることに。彼の精神は、彼が理解したいと願った、大規模な静寂の痕跡を見定めていたのだ」

languages.text: «La revelación del Omnissiah fue encriptada con gran meticulosidad, lo que indica su gran importancia. Comprenderlo en su totalidad está más allá de mi capacidad, pero un simple toque me bastó para darme cuenta de la importancia del secreto que esconde. O, más concretamente, el Diseño Secreto, que era como se refería a él el tecnohermano Abel. Su mente había percibido en el mundo que le rodeaba rastros de algún gran silencio que deseaba comprender».
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah's revelation was encrypted with great meticulousness, which indicates its great importance. Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. His mind had discerned in the world around him traces of some grand silence that he wished to comprehend."

traits.locale_text: «La revelación del Omnissiah fue encriptada con gran meticulosidad, lo que indica su gran importancia. Comprenderlo en su totalidad está más allá de mi capacidad, pero un simple toque me bastó para darme cuenta de la importancia del secreto que esconde. O, más concretamente, el Diseño Secreto, que era como se refería a él el tecnohermano Abel. Su mente había percibido en el mundo que le rodeaba rastros de algún silencio a gran escala que deseaba comprender».

languages.text: "Hermesih'in vahiyleri büyük titizlikle şifrelenmişti, yani son derece önemlilerdi. Tam anlamıyla kavramak benim dirayetimi aşar. Ancak içerisinde gizli sırrın veyahut Tekno Kardeş Abel'in kullandığı daha net tabirle Saklı Tasarım'ın büyüklüğünü fark edebilmem için tek bir dokunuş yeterli oldu. Zihni, çevresindeki dünyada kavramak istediği büyük bir sessizliğin izlerini fark etmişti."
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah's revelation was encrypted with great meticulousness, which indicates its great importance. Grasping it fully is beyond my ability, but a single touch was enough for me to realise the enormity of the secret concealed within. Or, more exactly, the Secret Design, which was how Tech-Brother Abel referred to it. His mind had discerned in the world around him traces of some grand silence that he wished to comprehend."

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih'in yaşattığı aydınlanmalar büyük titizlikle şifrelenmişti, yani son derece önemlilerdi. Tam anlamıyla kavramak benim dirayetimi aşar. Ancak içerisinde gizli sırrın veyahut Tekno Kardeş Abel'in kullandığı daha net tabirle Saklı Tasarım'ın büyüklüğünü fark edebilmem için tek bir dokunuş yeterli oldu. Zihni, çevresindeki dünyada algılamaya çalıştığı büyük bir sessizliğin izlerini sürmeye çalışıyordu."
